babel-desc: Fa #babel parser dwumadie he ka ho ma ɛma kwane ma bɛyɛ babel userbox kɔla a ɛwɔ tumi a ɛde custom templates bɛka ho
babel-autocreate-reason: Bɛreyɛ [[$1|Babel]] ɔfa nkyekyɛmu simpie he ankasa
babel-autocreate-text-levels:
Bɛ a bɛde di dwuma wɔ saa nkyekyɛmu yi mu he kyerɛ sɛ bɛwɔ ahokokwaw gyinabea $1 ma kasa $2.
